msbt.message: You've outdone yourself! What a delight it was to receive the birthday present you sent me. I don't know how you knew...but it was exactly what I wanted. To show my thanks, this is for youâ€”I insist!
I don't know how you did it, but the birthday present you sent me suits my tastes perfectly! I'm sending you a little token of my gratitude for your thoughtful gift. I will not take no for an answer!
You never cease to amaze me! The birthday present you sent is precisely what I wanted. It's as if you read my mind! I'm sending along a little thank-you gift...and don't you dare try to say no!

Thank you for the birthday present! It was such a thoughtful gesture. I hope you don't mind, but I've sent along a little thank you gift. Believe you me...you're never too old to have a happy birthday!

This birthday business is usually such a bore. But not this year! What a delightful day I had, thanks to you. And that present you gave me! I sent you a little something to say thanks. I do hope you like it!

I had a fab birthday and, I must tell you, your present had a lot to do with it. So I'm sending you a token of my appreciation. You know, as the years pile up, I'm pleased to see that so do the good memories!
